title: DORSEY PRINCESS CUT, LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE GOLD RIVIÈRE BRACELET
description: Classic, sophisticated, and chic. The Dorsey rivière bracelet nods to old world elegance while looking straight ahead. She is crafted with individually set, princess-cut lab-grown white sapphires in an 18k gold coated sterling silver setting.
details:

Setting: Bar set

Stone Shape: Princess cut
